concept.cypher: MATCH (nsi:NetworkServiceInstance) WITH DISTINCT nsi.name AS service_name MERGE (s:NetworkService {name: service_name}) RETURN service_name AS ServiceName

concept.description: Add to graph the relationship between NetworkService and NetworkServiceInstance nodes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (s:NetworkService), (si:NetworkServiceInstance) WHERE s.name = si.name MERGE (s)-[:HAS_INSTANCE]->(si) RETURN count(si) as RelationshipsCount
